thread.title: JetLease Capital Arranges Financing for Cessna Citation CJ2
thread.title_full: JetLease Capital Arranges Financing for Cessna Citation CJ2

title: JetLease Capital Arranges Financing for Cessna Citation CJ2
text:
JetLease Capital Arranges Financing for Cessna Citation CJ2 October 08, 2015, 06:00 AM Related: Aircraft , JetLease Capital 
JetLease Capital arranged and closed a $2 million loan financing for a Cessna Citation CJ2 based in the Midwest United States. The transaction was structured as a 7 year term loan, 15 year amortization, 80% LTV. The client is a high net worth individual/entrepreneur engaged in the real estate industry. JetLease Capital is based at the Palm Beach International Airport and specializes in corporate aircraft financing transactions including term loans, leases, and bridge loan structures for fixed wing aircraft and helicopters.
